posts.title: Functional Specifications
content: Our weekly strategy meeting will focus on upcoming promotional campaigns and reviewing current marketing KPIs. Please come prepared with updates on your respective projects.
We will meet in the conference room at 10 AM. Let's bring some fresh ideas to the table!
